errors: There is an issue with the HTTP request for %website_name%. Please verify your local network or if the domain name is correct.

invalid_domain_name: Please provide me at least one valid domain name.

no-pwnage: Great news, %email% hasn't been compromised in a data breach.
pwned: Oops, looks like %email% has been compromised in a breach involving %breach%.

Unfortunately, %email% has been exposed in a data breach affecting %breach%.
checking: I'm checking for a compromised email.
no-email: Please provide one or more email addresses you need me to check.
errors: I think %website_name% is down at the moment, please try again later.

Bad news, %website_name% is not responding. Maybe try at a later time?
